verses.verse: So these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> because he was <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Then the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel,<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H7410>Ram,<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H347>Job.<s%> His <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> because he <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> rather than <S%H430>God.<s%>

Also his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends,<s%> because they had <S%H4672>found<s%> no <S%H4617>answer,<s%> and yet had <S%H7561>condemned<s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>
Now <S%H453>Elihu<s%> had <S%H2442>waited<s%> to <S%H1697>speak<s%> to <S%H347>Job,<s%> because they were elder than <S%H2205>he.<s%>
When <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was no <S%H4617>answer<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled.<s%>

<S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%> <S%H559><s%> "I am <S%H6810>young,<s%> and you are very <S%H3453>old;<s%> Therefore I held <S%H2119>back,<s%> and <S%H3372>didn't<s%> dare <S%H2331>show<s%> you my <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> 'Days should <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> should <S%H3045>teach<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>'
<S%H403>But<s%> there is a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in <S%H582>man,<s%> and the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> gives them <S%H995>understanding.<s%>
It is not the <S%H7227>great<s%> who are <S%H2449>wise,<s%> nor the <S%H2205>aged<s%> who <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4941>justice.<s%>
Therefore I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085><s%> 'Listen to <S%H2331>me;<s%> I also will show my <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>'
<S%H3176>"Behold,<s%> I waited for your <S%H1697>words,<s%> and I <S%H238>listened<s%> for your <S%H8394>reasoning,<s%> while you searched <S%H2713>out<s%> what to <S%H4405>say.<s%>
<S%H995>Yes,<s%> I gave you my full attention, but there was no one who <S%H3198>convinced<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> or who <S%H6030>answered<s%> his <S%H561>words,<s%> among you.
Beware lest you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4672><s%> 'We have found <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> may <S%H5086>refute<s%> <S%H376>him,<s%> not man;'
for he has not <S%H6186>directed<s%> his <S%H4405>words<s%> against <S%H7725>me;<s%> neither will I answer him with your <S%H561>speeches.<s%>
"They are <S%H2865>amazed.<s%> They <S%H6030>answer<s%> no <S%H6275>more.<s%> They don't have a word to <S%H4405>say.<s%>
Shall I <S%H3176>wait,<s%> because they <S%H1696>don't<s%> speak, because they stand <S%H5975>still,<s%> and answer no <S%H6030>more?<s%>
I also will <S%H6030>answer<s%> my <S%H2506>part,<s%> and I also will <S%H2331>show<s%> my <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>
For I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4405>words.<s%> The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H990>within<s%> me constrains <S%H6693>me.<s%>
<S%H990>Behold,<s%> my breast is as <S%H3196>wine<s%> which has no <S%H6605>vent;<s%> like <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H178>wineskins<s%> it is ready to <S%H1234>burst.<s%>
I will <S%H1696>speak,<s%> that I may be <S%H7304>refreshed.<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> and <S%H6030>answer.<s%>
Please <S%H5375>don't<s%> let me respect any <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H6440>person,<s%> neither will I give flattering <S%H3655>titles<s%> to any <S%H120>man.<s%>
For I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know how to give flattering <S%H3655>titles;<s%> or else my <S%H6213>Maker<s%> would <S%H4592>soon<s%> take me <S%H5375>away.<s%>
